languages.text: [Истязать его, как истязали когда-то вас] "Я знаю, что такое настоящие муки. Позволь тебя просветить".
[Torture him as they tortured you] "I know the true meaning of torment. Allow me to educate you."
languages.original_text: [Истязать его, как истязали когда-то вас] "Я знаю, что такое настоящие муки. Позволь тебя просветить".

languages.text: [Ihn foltern, wie sie dich gefoltert haben] "Ich weiß, was Folter bedeutet. Erlaubt mir, es Euch zu zeigen."
languages.original_text: [Torture him as they tortured you] "I know the true meaning of torment. Allow me to educate you."

traits.locale_text: [Ihn foltern, wie sie dich gefoltert haben] "Ich weiß, was Folter bedeutet. Erlaubt mir, es Euch zu zeigen."

languages.text: [Le torturer comme ils l'ont fait avec vous] « Je connais le vrai sens du tourment. Laissez-moi vous l'enseigner. »
languages.original_text: [Torture him as they tortured you] "I know the true meaning of torment. Allow me to educate you."

traits.locale_text: [Le torturer comme ils l'ont fait avec vous] « Je connais le vrai sens du tourment. Laissez-moi vous l'enseigner. »

languages.text: [Torturarlo como te torturaron a ti] «Conozco el verdadero significado de la palabra tormento. Te lo enseñaré».
languages.original_text: [Torture him as they tortured you] "I know the true meaning of torment. Allow me to educate you."

traits.locale_text: [Torturarlo como te torturaron a ti] «Conozco el verdadero significado de la palabra tormento. Te lo enseñaré».

languages.text: [かつてされたように拷問する]「私は苦痛の真の意味を知っている。お前にも教えてやろう」
languages.original_text: [Torture him as they tortured you] "I know the true meaning of torment. Allow me to educate you."

traits.locale_text: [かつてされたように拷問する]「私は苦痛の真の意味を知っている。お前にも教えてやろう」

languages.text: [用你遭受折磨的方式来折磨他]“我明白何为真正的折磨，让我来教教你吧。”
languages.original_text: [Torture him as they tortured you] "I know the true meaning of torment. Allow me to educate you."

traits.locale_text: [用你遭受折磨的方式来折磨他]“我明白何为真正的折磨，让我来教教你吧。”

languages.text: [Adama kendi yaşadığın işkenceyi tattır] "Eziyetin hakiki manasını bilirim. Müsaadenle sana öğreteyim."
languages.original_text: [Torture him as they tortured you] "I know the true meaning of torment. Allow me to educate you."
